page.title: 17HALLATON: TORCH HOUSE 1
page.content: The{Torch Trust for the Blind}has its headquarters in Hallaton in the Hall, formerly the home of the Bewicke family. Its aim, as an interdenomin- ational Christian charity, is to provide Christian literature and fellowship for visually handicapped people. "The Torch" is a small magazine first printed over 50 years ago, and from that has developed the present organisation which publishes ten magazines, a wide range of booklets, Scripture Union notes, all available in braille, large print, moon type and on compact cassette. Torch House also operates a library service, a Christian training scheme for young visually handicapped people, and house parties - special weeks through the year for the blind, deaf/blind and their families.
